alert.note: Alert for Garden; Keith (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 01 at 2:08PM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR AN ICE JAM IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam is expected. * WHERE...Portions of panhandle Nebraska and southwest Nebraska, including the following counties, in the Nebraska Panhandle, Garden. In southwest Nebraska, Keith. * WHEN...Until 100 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 105 PM MST, local law enforcement reported an ice jam near the advisory area. Minor flooding is ongoing where it normally occurs in fields near the river. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Lewellen, Ash Hollow State Historical Park, Clear Creek State Wildlife Management Area, Ruthon and Eagle Gulch Campground. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
